data.text:
Data collected when visiting the website https://www.vodohod-cruises.com

Personal Information

When visiting the site personal data is transmitted voluntarily by the user, it may include: name, surname, patronymic, phone numbers, email addresses, addresses for the delivery of goods or services, details of the company that the user represents, position in the company that the user represents, accounts on social networks, as well as other fillable form fields.

This data is collected for the purpose of providing services or selling goods, the possibility of communication with the user or other user activity on the site, as well as for the purpose of sendong the user information that he agreed to receive.

We do not check the accuracy of the data provided and do not guarantee the high-quality execution of orders, the provision of services or feedback when information provided is incorrect.

Data is collected by means of the fill-out forms available on the site (for example, registration, placing an order, subscribing, leaving feedback, question and others).

The forms featured on the site can transfer data both directly to the site and to the websites of third-party organizations (scripts of third-party services).

Data can be collected through the technology of cookies (cookies) both directly by the site or by scripts of third-party services. This data is collected automatically, sending this data can be prohibited by disabling cookies in the browser in which the site opens.

Non personal data

In addition to personal data, when visiting the site, non-personal data is collected, its collection is automatically carried out by the web server on which the site is located, by means of CMS (content management system), by the scripts of third-party organizations installed on the site. The data collected automatically includes: IP address and country of registration, the name of the domain which led you to us, visitors' surfing from one page of the site to another, information that your browser provides voluntarily when visiting the site, cookies (cookies), visits, other data collected by third-party analytics counters installed on the site are recorded.

This data is non-personalized and is aimed at improving customer service, improving the usability of the site, analyzing traffic statistics.

Providing data to third parties

We do not disclose personal information of users to companies, organizations and individuals who are not associated with us. The exceptions are the cases listed below.

Public user data

User‚Äôs personal data can be published in the public domain in accordance with the site‚Äôs functionality, for example, when leaving feedback / questions, the name indicated by the user can be published, such activity on the site is voluntary, and the user agrees to such publication by his actions.

As required by law

Information may be disclosed in order to prevent fraud or other illegal actions, at the request of the law and in other cases stipulated by the laws of the Russian Federation.

To provide services, fulfill obligations

The user agrees that personal information can be transferred to third parties in order to provide the services ordered on the website, to fulfill other obligations to the user. Such third parties , for example, include a courier service, postal services, freight services and others.

Third party services installed on the site

The site may contain forms that collect personal information of other organizations, in this case, the collection, storage and protection of user personal information is carried out by third parties in accordance with their privacy policy.

The collection, storage and protection of information received from a third-party organization is carried out in accordance with this privacy policy.

How we protect your information

We take appropriate security measures to collect, store and process the collected data to protect it from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction, restrict our employees, contractors and agents to access personal data, and constantly improve the methods of collecting, storing and processing data, including physical security measures to prevent unauthorized access to our systems.

Your acceptance of these terms

By registering on the site, you agree to this privacy policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use it. Your continued use of the site after making changes to this policy will be considered as your acceptance of these changes.

Denial of responsibility

The privacy policy does not apply to any other websites and is not applicable to third-party websites that may contain a reference to our site and from which links to the site can be made, as well as links from this site to other Internet sites. We are not responsible for the actions of other websites.

Privacy Policy Changes

We reserve the right, at our discretion, to update this privacy policy at any time. We recommend that users regularly check this page (https:// ) to keep abreast of any changes about how we protect user information that we collect. By using the site, you agree to accept responsibility for periodically reviewing the privacy policy and changes to it.
